result.eng: He rubbed Sudocrem onto his body.
result.html: chuimil sé sudocrem dá chabhailHe rubbed Sudocrem onto his body.
result.ponchtml: ċuimil sé sudocrem dá ċaḃailHe rubbed Sudocrem onto his body.

result.eng: He meant not only health of the body but also health of the mind.
result.ga: ní sláinte an choirp amháin a bhí i gceist aige ach sláinte na haigne chomh maith
result.orig: ní sláinte an choirp amháin a bhí i gceist aige ach sláinte na haigne chomh maith
result.html: ní sláinte an choirp amháin a bhí i gceist aige ach sláinte na haigne chomh maithHe meant not only health of the body but also health of the mind.
result.ponchtml: ní sláinte an ċoirp aṁáin a ḃí i gceist aige aċ sláinte na haigne ċoṁ maiṫHe meant not only health of the body but also health of the mind.

result.eng: I was sweating and tired in every part of my body.
result.ga: bhí allas liom agus tuirse i ngach ball díom
result.orig: bhí allas liom agus tuirse i ngach ball díom
result.html: bhí allas liom agus tuirse i ngach ball díomI was sweating and tired in every part of my body.
result.ponchtml: ḃí allas liom agus tuirse i ngaċ ball díomI was sweating and tired in every part of my body.
